participant_1.background:
I work as a mall cop.
I am a huge fan of dogs.
I am recently divorced.
I wish to buy a corvette when i retire.

participant_2.background:
I volunteer in my spare time.
I hope to change the world.
I work in a factory.
I love to tell jokes.
I am always early to everything.

content.text: I'm good, thanks for asking. How are you today?
I'm doing well, thank you! I'm a mall cop, and I love dogs.
That's great! I'm a volunteer, and I love telling jokes.
That's amazing! I wish I could be a volunteer. I've been divorced recently, and I'm hoping to buy a Corvette when I retire.
I'm sorry to hear about your divorce. I hope you're doing okay. I work in a factory, and I love to change the world.
That's so great! I hope you're able to accomplish that. I'm always early to everything, so I'm sure I'll be the first one in line to buy a Corvette when they're released.
I'm sure you will! I'm always late to everything, so I'm not sure I'll be able to get one.
Well, I'm sure you'll find a way to get one. You seem like a very determined person.
Thank you! I appreciate that. I'm sure you'll be able to get one too, since you're so organized.
I'm sure I will! I'm just going to have to save up my money for a while.
That's okay. It will be worth it in the end.
I'm sure it will! Thanks for talking to me.
No problem! It was nice talking to you too.
